49.eng-name: The Book of the Etiquette of Judges

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Umm Salamah that:The Messenger of Allah [SAW] said: "You refer your disputes to me, but I am only human, and some of you may be more eloquent in arguing their case than others. If I pass judgment in favor of one of you, against his brother's rights, let him not take it, for it is a piece of fire that I am giving him

chapter.eng-name: Judgment Based on What is Apparent
